title: Tambow's Wombatical Wanderings
description: In this equally appealing sequel to Tambow, Tambowâ€™s Wombatical Wanderings continues to tell the story of how Tambow, a bouncy young wombat, and his mother, Wombi, resume their journey. Their quest follows a stream down to the coast to find a ship to take them home. But along the way, they have to find out where home is! On paw, raft, steam train and sailing barge, Tambow blunders through the adventures that unfold in every chapter. His mischievous and inquisitive nature constantly gets them both into trouble, but with endless hilarious moments to lighten the danger of their journey.Carried along in the adventure, the reader rejoices with them as they discover which country they do come from, and how they will return to it.Visit www.tambowthewombat.com for a peak inside!
author: Charles    Lamb
